sections.title: Welcome to Dataland
text: This is the main introduction of our homepage.

cards.title: Data Gaps
cards.text: Valuable insights remain hidden, preventing businesses from harnessing the full potential of their data.

cards.title: Data Quality
cards.text: Inaccurate, inconsistent, or outdated data jeopardizes the integrity of analytics and decision processes, leading to misguided strategies.

cards.title: Data Usage Rights
cards.text: Companies must ensure they have the legal permissions to collect, store, process, and share data while adhering to regulations and privacy laws.

cards.title: Data Usage
cards.text: Many organizations struggle with underutilization. Data analysis tools might be intimidating or inaccessible to certain teams, limiting the ability to extract valuable insights.

cards.title: Search
cards.text: Utilize the search feature to find specific companies within the platform.

cards.title: Request company’s inclusion
cards.text: Request company’s inclusion in case you can’t find the company you are looking for.

cards.title: Request framework data
cards.text: Create or join a campaign to get the missing data.

cards.title: Download
cards.text: Download either through the platform or through API.

sections.title: Come together
text: to create a dataset that nobody can create alone while sharing the costs.

cards.text: Utilize the search feature to find specific companies within the platform.
Request company’s inclusion in case you can’t find the company you are looking for.
Create or join a campaign to get the missing data.
Download either through the platform or through API.

sections.title: Imprint
text:
Diese Beta-Version von Dataland ist ein Gemeinschaftsprojekt der d-fine GmbH, der PricewaterhouseCoopers GmbH Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft.

Kontakt: d-fine GmbH, An der Hauptwache 7, 60313 Frankfurt am Main, Telefon: +49 69 90737-0, dataland@d-fine.com

Registergericht: Amtsgericht Frankfurt am Main, Registernummer: HRB 48 103, Umsatzsteuer-Identifikationsnummer gemäß § 27a Umsatzsteuergesetz:, Umsatzsteueridentifikationsnr. DE 813 483 155, Sitz der Gesellschaft ist Frankfurt.

Geschäftsführer: Dr. Florian Baumann, Christoph Belafi, Dr. Christoph Bennemann, Dr. Oliver Bohr, Dr. Christoph Burmester, Dr. Ashot Davtyan, Todor Dobrikov, Dr. Arndt Dombert, Dr. Uwe Dörr, Dr. Andreas Geyer, Nadine Gottschalk, Dr. Oliver Hein, Dr. Stefan Heinrichs, Dr. Matthias Hirtschulz, Dr. Bodo Huckestein, Dr. Sascha Hügle, Dr. Tilman Huhne, Jens Itzenhäuser, Ulf Henning Jacobs, Dr. Jan Jureit, Dr. Oliver Kayser-Herold, Dr. Andreas Keese, Dr. Henriette Kröner, Dr. Florian Merz, Dr. Jochen Meyer, Dr. Karsten Meyer, Dr. Mathias Michel, Dr. Cornelius Mund, Dr. Christian Oehler, Wolfgang Pleyer, Dr. Jörn Rank, Dr. Christian Romeike, Alexander Schalk, Dr. Egbert Schark, Dr. Christoph Schneggenburger, Nadja Schuster, Dr. Markus Seifert, Dr. Constantin Sobiella, Artur Steiner, Dr. Roland Uhlig, Markus von Rothkirch, Dr. Hans-Peter Wächter, Dr. Andreas Werner, Dr. Magnus Wobben
